prompts: Create a Pokemon with spiky blue quills and a stealthy demeanor.
Generate an icy-looking creature that thrives in mountainous terrains.
Imagine a Pokemon that can burrow through the ground with sharp claws.
Design a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sleek aquatic predator.
Show me a creature with a mix of blue and white colors, perfect for snowy habitats.
Give me a Pokemon that has both ground and ice traits, with a unique body shape.
Make a Pokemon that has a tough exterior but a playful personality.
